article: Leo is 66 years old. But he  _  young. He is a basketball fan. He has two  _  ---one is a son and the other is a daughter. He has a great  _  collection. But he never  _  sports. He only likes collecting sports  _  . He has 5 basketballs, 7 baseballs and 3 ping-pong balls. His son, Neal, likes soccer. He is in a soccer club. He often plays soccer with  _  friends. He has a computer, too. Playing games is  _  . He likes it very much. And his daughter, Nancy, likes  _  very much. But she doesn't have a volleyball and she doesn't play it. She only likes  to watch  it  _  TV.
